Plintissa arrives at the Maximal base, leaving a trail of mech fluid blood
behind her. she transforms and walks up to Liono. "you know, at first ai
doubted you...but now i know i shouldn't have. your a great leader. and i
probably shouldn't be in this group...i disobeyed your command......well,
where's the CR chamber, i can't leave a blood trail wherever i go...." she
said...she couldn't smile though..too hurt.....

Subject: Re: Neo Beast Wars


> Liono: Picks up Iron and Plintissa We going home the day is won and you 3
did
> Well. Iron and Plintissa meet me at the Dragon & Lion room after your
cycle
> in the repair chamber ::Picks up inferno's gun hand and flies the Wounded
> back to the base:: For my pred parts collection
>
> ::sits outside the Door waiting for Iron and Plintissa::
